name: Elfworld
description: Elfworld is an app on GameFi featuring elf characters. This game creates a huge metaverse with elf characters whose designs are based off movies, animes and games around the world. The elves are all NFT characters according to the ERC-721 standard, and can be traded on our platform. Elfworld allows players to capture elves with elf balls, train them to battle and earn ELFT. There will be more upcoming features. Elfworld runs on BSC network, which ensures the trading prime cost is very low. Allows MetaMask and other web3 wallets for transaction and gas fees. MetaMask can be installed as a browser extension or as an application on a mobile device.
